Plot: Two very different families converge on Martha's Vineyard one weekend for a wedding.
Title: Jumping the Broom
Writer: Elizabeth Hunter (screenplay), Arlene Gibbs (screenplay), Elizabeth Hunter (story)
Actors: Angela Bassett, Paula Patton, Laz Alonso, Loretta Devine
tomatoConsensus: Its heart is in the right place -- and so is its appealing cast -- but Jumping the Broom is ultimately too cliched and thinly written to recommend.
